title: Faculty and Leadership | Columbia AI
content: Home / Admissions / Faculty and Leadership The online Columbia Artificial Intelligence (AI) executive certificate program is taught by expert faculty members within the Fu Foundation School of Engineering and Applied Science at Columbia University. Our team of interdisciplinary instructors and accomplished leadership develop and lead a curriculum that challenges you to confront complex issues, engineer innovative solutions, and achieve your full potential to become an engineering leader in your organization. With support from our faculty and leadership, you will get ahead — and stay ahead — in your industry. Get to know our program faculty and school leadership below.
